extendedInfo.description: The ultimate video experience is just a tap away with the newly redesigned DIRECTV App. Stream live TV anywhere in your home, with select channels available outside your home. Watch hit movies and shows On Demand at home or on the go. Set your DVR to record your favorite shows from anywhere. And now the DIRECTV App even lets you find whatever you want to watch on TV by using just your voice, from anywhere.  At home, you can even use your TV screen to display your dialogue and search results. Limited programming available. Additional charges may apply. Available for customers in the USA only. FEATURES- Find what you want to watch on TV just by speaking to the app at home or away from home.- Use your voice to change the channel, record, and play content when youâre at home. - Watch movies and shows on demand at home or on the go from HBOÂ®, CinemaxÂ®, StarzÂ®, EncoreÂ®, and more.- Turn your phone into a portable TV and watch top TV channels live in any room of your home.- Set your DVR to record your favorite shows from anywhere.- Get program descriptions, cast & crew info, photos, recommendations & parental ratings.WATCH- Watch thousands of your favorite shows and movies On Demand right on your phone.- Filter the Guide, Movies, TV Shows and Networks sections to view programs and channels you can watch on your phone.- Set parental controls, and enjoy peace of mind over what your children are watching.BROWSE- Search for programs using just your voice. Speak naturally. Search by title, channel, keyword, actor, genre, time frame, almost anything.- Browse and discover thousands of On Demand titles.- Search for DIRECTV CINEMA movies based on categories.- Search for any television show up to 14 days in advance, view top picks of the week, set your favorite channels, and sort by programs you can watch on your phone.RECORDINGS- Record shows by a single episode or entire series to any DIRECTV DVR in your home.- Add additional time to the start or end of a recording request or select to manually record a channel for a specific amount of time.- Set recordings for DIRECTV CINEMA movies to watch on your home TV any time. Order movies and events without your receiver connected to a phone line.SOCIAL- Share your favorite shows with friends on Facebook and Twitter.- Quickly get info and set recordings for DIRECTV shows your friends on Facebook & Twitter posted.- Browse the top shows and movies people are currently talking about and set your DVR to record.MORE- Manage your account.- Instant access to Mobile Answer Center link for FAQs.- Browsing functionality is available to everyone.- Recording functionality is available to DIRECTV customers with a DVR only.REQUIREMENTS- Compatible with most Android phones running 2.2 or later.- DIRECTV customers must have a residential home account registered on the DIRECTV website to watch On Demand content and access recording functionality.- Watching On Demand or select Live TV Streaming channels outside the home requires an active Wi-Fi or Mobile Internet connection. - Available content is based on your current programming package and premium service. Not all content is available to stream at this time.- Live TV Streaming in-home only channels require a Wi-Fi connection to your home network and a DIRECTV PlusÂ® HD DVR (models R22, and HR20 or higher) connected to a broadband Internet connection.- Scheduling a recording requires a Wi-Fi, or Mobile Internet connection and a DIRECTV PlusÂ® DVR or HD DVR. Receivers do not require phone or Internet connection to schedule a recording.- On Demand scheduling requires a DIRECTV PlusÂ® HD DVR (model HR20 or later or R22) connected to the Internet.-Voice TV mode requires an Internet-connected HR24 model or above.Use of the DIRECTV phone Application by DIRECTV customers is subject to DIRECTV's Customer Agreement and Privacy Policy (available on the DIRECTV website).

reviews.title: Why not allow watching content away from home?
reviews.comment: Itd be alot better if I could use this to view live tv away. Could you not just limit the devices to a certain number and allow this? If im at home Im not gonna whip out my phone when there arw 50 55 and 40 inch tvs on the walls. But at work or on the go. Yes the phone would be great.  And dont say get genie go.
reviews.author: Chris Moore

reviews.title: Mobile devices
reviews.comment: An ipad should not be the only tablet you can use for mobile directv. I am very diappointed by this. I have a nook and I cannot watch my movies because its only compatible with the ipad. I think that this should be changed.
reviews.author: Eunice Smith

reviews.title: No streaming on S4
reviews.comment: No streaming for the last couple months on my S4. Error message 5101. Not worth keeping if not functioning like it should.  Un installing.
reviews.author: Eric Benavides

reviews.title: Above Average
reviews.comment: Awesome tool if you have DTV and want to browse & select, schedule programs from your smartphone... in my case I am using a Droid...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Dish network is lightyears ahead
reviews.comment: Direct tv, your app sucks.  You want to see a good satellite app, go check out Dish Network.  With dish network app and a broadband connection you can watch all your recorded shows, plus all live tv, not just a third of your channels.  Poor, poor, poor.
reviews.author: mike iselin

reviews.title: Please fix
reviews.comment: Since update I\'m not able to watch on demand on my phone anymore. I keep getting an error code saying \"unable to stream, will resolve soon\" soon has been over a week now. Half of the reason I pay the money I do is so I can watch direct tv on my phone. Please fix or I will cancwl
reviews.author: Michael Beebe

reviews.title: False advertisement
reviews.comment: Why would I watch something on my phone when my tv is right there? You must have your phone on the same WiFi network as your tv. So no I can\'t really watch on my phone. And the channel selection is terrible for streaming anyway.
reviews.author: Derek Latone

reviews.title: Records the wrong channel.
reviews.comment: I select channel 663 (fox sports Detroit) and when I click \"record event\" it tries to record a different channel that don\'t even get.
reviews.author: Dan Nederhood

reviews.title: Weak
reviews.comment: Can not check or manage account and rarely works at all.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Decent...but....
reviews.comment: Would be great if you could view recorded programs list of DVR and Series manager list from anywhere!
reviews.author: William Clarke

reviews.title: Choppy!
reviews.comment: Works great for most features. Getting choppy live TV    playback on every channel. Droid DNA with a 20mbps WiFi connection. Live TV option is horrible that you have to be on the same WiFi network. GET WITH THE TIMES! Especially since you can\'t use your DirecTV login for apps that require cable login: ESPN, NBC Sports, et al.!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Its ok
reviews.comment: Lag is terrible at times. The native watchON app does better in loading guide.
reviews.author: Brian Morgan

reviews.title: Missing feature
reviews.comment: Searching for shows to record dIdn\'t work nearly as well as using the guide. No way to show scheduled recordings. On my home network the app doesn\'t see the DVR.   Not a great effort...
reviews.author: Scott Mitchell

reviews.title: Bad upgrade
reviews.comment: This new upgrade has made a mediocre app considerably worse. Search function isn\'t functioning at all today. Looking for Any specific programming is a ridiculous hassle; why??
reviews.author: Robtb B

reviews.title: Wow.  Awesome update.
reviews.comment: I now can save my favorite channels.  This app is almost perfect (for me at least).  Another suggestion:  The capability to save the guide settings to \"view by channel\", or \"date & time\", etc., so that it doesn\'t have to be changed every time you go to view the guide.
reviews.author: K Parry

reviews.title: This latest update sucks balls!
reviews.comment: Why screw up something that works?  It doesn\'t find me receiver.  It doesn\'t list all my channels in the guide.  It blows!
reviews.author: david walker

reviews.title: Needs Work
reviews.comment: You cannot browse by channel; The guide takes too long when flipping through date/time view; needs better filters along with one allowing you to view the On Demands included with package - right now you see 1 for every 10 paid Cinema listings.
reviews.author: Will Faulkenberry

reviews.title: Won\'t stream anymore
reviews.comment: I\'ve enjoyed using this app for several months including streaming tv shows but in the past week it has stopped working. Get an error code every time I try to stream. Really frustrating. Please fix.
reviews.author: Kelly Neiling

reviews.title: Great now with easier gui.
reviews.comment: Version 3 is the best yet.  Everything is easier to use.  DVR\'s easier to schedule.
reviews.author: JW vanLohuizen
